sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Apple ( AAPL ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.1%.
Year to date, Apple registers a 20.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is American Express ( AXP ), trading down 0.7%.
American Express is lower by about 16.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.5%, and Walt Disney ( DIS ), trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
